article: african leaders hoped to find a resolution to zimbabwe 's deepening political crisis saturday at an emergency summit in zambia , but zimbabwean president robert mugabe refused to attend , underlining his growing isolation in the region and the world .
abstract: african leaders to discuss zimbabwe s deepening crisis without robert mugabe
